title: "Report from buoydata data pull"
output: html_document
params: 
  sameDim: NA  
  dimFields: NA
  col_name_added: NA
  col_name_removed: NA
  removed_IDs: NA
  added_IDs: NA
  removed_rows: NA
  added_rows: NA
date: "`r Sys.time()`"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


# Same dimension

Do the two data sets have the name number of buoys and the same number of variables?

```{r samedim, echo = FALSE}
params$sameDim
```

```{r samedim2, echo = FALSE}
params$dimFields
```


### Field names added or removed

```{r fields, echo = FALSE}
print(paste0("Fields added: ",params$col_name_added))
print(paste0("Fields removed: ",params$col_name_removed))
```


### Buoys added or removed

```{r IDs, echo = FALSE}
print(paste0("IDs added: ",params$added_IDs))
print(paste0("IDs removed: ",params$removed_IDs))
```

## Added Rows

```{r addedrows, echo = FALSE}
params$added_rows |> 
  gt::gt()
```


## Removed Rows

```{r removedrows, echo = FALSE}
params$removed_rows |> 
  gt::gt()
```
